briefTitle: Epanova® for Lowering Very High Triglycerides II (EVOLVE II)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Triglyceride for All Subjects
outcomeMeasures.description: This primary endpoint was tested in parallel together with the first of the secondary endpoints, each at 0.025 Type I error rate.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Triglycerides for Subjects With at Least 1 Qualifying Triglyceride >885 mg/dL
outcomeMeasures.description: This first secondary endpoint in subjects with at least 1 qualifying triglyceride \>885 mg/dL was tested in parallel together with the primary endpoint, each at 0.025 Type I error rate.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Non-High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (mg/dL)
outcomeMeasures.description: This secondary endpoint, together with the 3rd. and 4th secondary ones, was treated as the core secondary, and the p value from the hypothesis test on its treatment comparison was adjusted by using Hommel's procedure.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (mg/dL)
outcomeMeasures.description: This secondary endpoint, together with the 2nd. and 4th. secondary ones, was treated as the core secondary, and the p value from the hypothesis test on its treatment comparison was adjusted by using Hommel's procedure.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Triglyceride(mg/dL) in Subjects With Biochemically Defined Fredrickson Type V (Triglyceride/Very-Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol ≥6)
outcomeMeasures.description: This secondary endpoint in subjects with Biochemically Defined Fredrickson Type V (Triglyceride/Very-Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol ≥6), together with the 2nd. and 3rd.secondary ones, was treated as the core secondary, and the p value from the hypothesis test on its treatment comparison was adjusted by using Hommel's procedure.
